name: Colors of the Cube demo
description:
Colors of the Cube is about a cube trying to restore color to a colorless world ruled by triangles.

Each level your goal is to reach the orb of color so you can release a new color to the world. The sneaky triangle will try and get to the orb before you to stop you from getting more colors.

Each level comes with a new twist and challenge for you to try and overcome.

If you have the time, please answer these questions about the game. https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1VxHkoG9Y8KljSrzWkPp42q3W8kMLFjN8DBw1XVg2a1g/vie...

Your feedback would really help me develop and improve this game. You can also choose to be a playtester in the survey and if you do you will get a free copy of the game when it is completed. Don't forget to wishlist the game on steam too! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1398520/Colors_of_the_Cube/

Anyone is also welcome to join the Colors of the Cube discord server. https://discord.gg/VyWXfpv
